meanings.definition: The ability to be extended or stretched.
meanings.sent1: Her extensibilities allowed her to reach the high shelf easily.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band's extensibilities made it perfect for holding things together.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's extensibilities were put to the test when it was blown up too much!
meanings.sent4: His extensibilities in adapting to new situations were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's extensibilities on stage captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The quality of being capable of being extended.
meanings.sent1: The fabric's extensibilities made it ideal for making stretchy clothes.
meanings.sent2: The material's extensibilities allowed for easy customization.
meanings.sent3: The toy's extensibilities made it fun to play with for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her extensibilities in problem-solving impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The tree's extensibilities in growth amazed the gardener.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be stretched or expanded.
meanings.sent1: The balloon's extensibilities were tested when it was filled with air.
meanings.sent2: The rubber's extensibilities made it a versatile material for many uses.
meanings.sent3: The cake's extensibilities surprised everyone when it rose perfectly in the oven.
meanings.sent4: The city's extensibilities in terms of population growth were evident.
meanings.sent5: The company's extensibilities in innovation led to its success.
